section.heading: Persons believed to be carriers of communicable diseases — Leaving detention without discharge.
section.text: It shall be unlawful for a person detained in a place or institution pursuant to an order of the Mayor to leave said place or institution unless discharged in the manner provided in § 7-134 or 7-135.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 14-194 substituted “Mayor” for “Director of the Department of Human Services”.
D.C. Law 15-105 validated a previously made technical correction.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.
